tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She clearly fails to communicate with her patients and has no compassion and value of time. As directed  took 9 test on Friday and collected the reports on saturday and went her the same day. We are told, " such cases are dealt only on wednesday. She could have informed us the same on friday. We requested  her but in vain#. As much as she sticks to her work ethics and values her time she could have  respect her patients time and money. **********  *** *************  ** **** *** ***** ** ********
